mode: special settings for how input is delivered
inputmode: how does the network receive input
r: escape rate of hazard function (GIF neuron)
thr_sig_cbLIFrandthr: std of distribution of threshold potentials
V0: initial membrane potential for meso sim
Vinit: width of initial distribution of membrane potentials
parent: parent network: source of default parameters
record_micro: which quantities to record during Brian simulation
record_meso: flag for recording detailed data in meso sim
meso_histbuffer_min: minimal length of history buffer in mesoscopic simulation
scaleWeights: flag switching on internal weight scaling depending on network size and connectivity
scaleNet: mode of network scaling if Nint deviates from default, can be empty string, I or EI
N_record_max: max number of units to record with StateMonitor
tref_pyr: refractory period of exc. input Poisson spike trains
CV_Ji: CV of normally distributed inh strengths (Malerba2016)
